  • Class
    Description
    GameChoicePanel
    Class used to create a menu between the StartingMenuPanel and the GamePanel, where the user can choose the GameChoiceController.GameMode he wants to play.
    GamePanel
    Class used to display the actual game.
    GamePanel.State
    State PLAYER_TURN AI_TURN GAME_PAUSED WIN MATCH_WIN
    MainFrame
    Creates the custom JFrame of the entire game.
    MainFrame.Cards
    State MAIN SETTINGS GAME
    ResizablePanel
    Class used to provide the default methods and attributes of each Panel of the game.
    SettingsPanel
    Class used to create the menu where the user can change the settings of the game and the music.
    StartingMenuPanel
    Class used to create the first visible ResizablePanel on screen.
